title: Puppies Make Me Happy
description:
Now Available from Puppies Make Me Happy. Puppies are calling them the "Sunnies of Summer"- Constructed from virtually indestructible acetate. 
- Gold debossed imprint.
- 100% UV protection reduces eye fatigue and long-term sun damage. 
- Micro-Fiber cleaning pouch
- Uni-Sex FitTry on now with Snapchat: https://bit.ly/2xhf8mu
